    Test R Post

    Here are a few examples of embedding R code in an Rmarkdown document and using knitr to create a regular markdown file:

    summary(cars)

    ##      speed           dist    
##  Min.   : 4.0   Min.   :  2  
##  1st Qu.:12.0   1st Qu.: 26  
##  Median :15.0   Median : 36  
##  Mean   :15.4   Mean   : 43  
##  3rd Qu.:19.0   3rd Qu.: 56  
##  Max.   :25.0   Max.   :120

    par(mar = c(4, 4, 0.1, 0.1), omi = c(0, 0, 0, 0))
plot(cars)

    Thats it!
